entry.title: HorizonRoboticsInternal/gail-container
entry.summary:
Containers for development of General AI Lab.

gail-container

This reporsitory maintains a docker image for running CI/CD of Hobot and Alf (and hopefully for other purposes in the future).

The main implementation can be found at the top-level Dockerfile.

How to update the docker

  1. Update the requirements.txt and commit

  2. Create a new release on GitHub.

  3. After the release is created, a GitHub workflow will kick off to build the new docker images.

  4. It takes about 10 minutes for the docker image to be built and pushed to our GitHub packages. You will find the list of packages (i.e. docker images) here. The one tagged with "latest" is the one that it just builds.

    In the above example, you can now use

    ghcr.io/horizonroboticsinternal/gail-container:2023.01.17

    to refer the docker image in your CI/CD GitHub action, or pull it for your local use.
